name: Scotts Miracle-Gro Company
description: Scotts Miracle-Gro Company is a leading provider of lawn and garden products, aiming to enhance the beauty and health of outdoor spaces. Founded in 1868 and based in Marysville, Ohio, the company operates in two primary segments: U.S. Consumer and Hawthorne. The U.S. Consumer segment includes a comprehensive range of consumer lawn and garden care products, including fertilizers, grass seed, and pest control solutions under well-known brands such as Scotts, Miracle-Gro, and Ortho. In recent years, Scotts Miracle-Gro has significantly expanded its portfolio through acquisitions, particularly in the indoor gardening market, with the Hawthorne segment focusing on hydroponics and other supplies for cannabis growers. The company emphasizes sustainability and innovation, developing products designed to meet the evolving needs of consumers while minimizing environmental impact. With a strong commitment to community involvement and education, Scotts Miracle-Gro also invests in initiatives that promote gardening and environmental stewardship. As a leader in the lawn and garden industry, Scotts Miracle-Gro continues to drive growth and enhance its market position through strategic partnerships and an unwavering focus on customer satisfaction.
